profile:
Structural Restoration Systems is a family run business that has been servicing the Greater Toronto Area for over 40 years. Over this time we have gained the trust of many top home builders, property management companies and hundreds of individual homeowners. If you are looking for a trusted contractor, look no further your experience with us is the most important thing! We provide free quotes!  

**We've won 'best of' Homestars 4 years in a row for our customer service and workmanship**

We offer a variety of services that include but are not limited to; renovations (washrooms, basements, floor plan improvements, demolition etc.), drywall repairs, exterior waterproofing, interior foundation crack repairs, fences, decks, masonry repairs including; chimneys, brick replacement, tuck pointing and concrete repairs. We also provide mini excavator services. We have remained in business for over 40 years because we always give our customers the best experience possible. We pride ourselves on receiving repeat business and recommendations. Not sure if we can help you on your project, click above on the "get a quote" button, visit our website www.srstoronto.ca or give us a call. No job is too small!
warranty_terms: 1 to 10 years depending on the job type
name: Structural Restoration Systems

profile:
HENRY'S BOBCAT SERVICE
Our services include excavation/digging, back filling, water main breaks, landscaping, concrete work and breaking, post holes and more.

We supply you with experienced operators and the equipment you need on your project at reasonable rates.

We provide bobcats, excavators, track machines, backhoes and other machines along with the necessary equipment required for most residential and industrial projects.

Materials such as sand, gravel, topsoil, sod and any boxes/bins required for the cleanup of waste or dirt removal can also be supplied.

SERVING: Toronto, GTA, North York, Etobicoke, Richmond Hill, Thornhill, Vaughan, Downsview, Woodbridge, Bolton, Caledon, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Brampton, Peel Region and their surrounding area's.
services: Hourly rental of excavation machines with operators for residential and industrial projects
specialities: Available 24 hours for an emergency repair or water main breaks - just call 416-721-9594
project_minimum: 4 hour minimum plus machine float charge

AK home star builders
A name you can trust. 
Building Solid, Beautiful & Unique Living Spaces in Toronto 
AK Home Star builders serving GTA and surrounding area for more than 15 years with its professional crew. The Company has been taking major design and build, renovation, and remodeling projects. We deal with all kinds of projects, from small washroom renovation, landscaping to building custom houses and smart home automation. You can trust our service and the quality we provide. We always use environment-friendly products which are beneficial for all our health. With this, we also help you to renovate your home. We are a leading Builders in GTA which has satisfied many clients and we look forward to satisfying more with our service. We always go budget-friendly. We have experts who help with Home Renovations. 
We have a one of a kind Showroom right in Toronto. For all your building and construction needs we can assist. For your dream yard or home we have it covered. Our design experts and construction group will handle any size project you have.

profile:
Welcome to Simply Exquisite, we are a construction and renovations general contractor in Toronto, serving the GTA and surrounding areas.

For over 20 years we have worked with property and homeowners providing them with high caliber commercial and home renovation services. We have earned our reputation as one of the best general contractors in the GTA through our trade expertise and professionalism. We are customer-service driven, pay extra attention to details, and deliver a quality product, on time and budget.

We approach every project with this simply promise: Every home renovation, general contracting, and construction project will be Simply Exquisite. That is our guarantee.

Whether you are looking to do a home renovation in Toronto, from kitchen design and renovations, to bathroom remodels and basement finishing, or something smaller like having your kitchen refaced or installing basement heated flooring, you can trust the best construction company in Toronto to give you the peace of mind of a job well done.

We offer award-winning renovation services that come with a 5-year warranty. We provide in-house design services and counseling, free of charge, with a licensed architectural designer. We extend this added value with every one of our projects so that you can be sure that your project will satisfy your needs.
services: We specialize in design and renovation services for kitchens, bathrooms, basements, landscaping and more!
specialities: Kitchens, bathrooms, basements, and full home renovations.
name: Simply Exquisite Construction

profile:
Aura-Con is a Toronto based construction company that specializes in Demolition, Excavation, Foundation and Shoring Solutions. Our services include demolition of low-rise to mid-rise structures, site preparation and earthworks, bulk and detailed excavation for residential, commercial and industrial buildings. We specialize in variety of foundation and Shoring solutions such as Soldier Piles & Lagging, Caisson Walls, Structural Caissons, Sheet Piling, Underpinning, Tiebacks and Soil Anchors. At Aura-Con we have highly knowledgeable and experienced personnel at all levels of the company. Our extensive experience allows us to provide value engineering and high-quality service to our clients.

Aura-Con is equipped with a broad range of specialized equipment and highly skilled operators, which enables us to complete projects with optimal performance. Safety is our priority; we have a comprehensive safety program and safety training for all our employees. We ensure a safe work environment throughout all our projects. Aura-Con is uniquely positioned to provide value to its clients by combining Demolition, Shoring Solutions, and Excavation services thus increasing efficiency and productivity. Every project is completed with our clients needs at the forefront, providing communication, reliability and integrity.
products: Aura-Con is a Toronto based construction company that specializes in Demolition, Excavation, Foundation and Shoring Solutions.

profile:
The Professional Post Hole Guy services the following areas: Brampton, Mississauga, Oakville, Milton, Georgetown, Caledon, Toronto, Vaughn, Markham, New Market, Bolton, North York, Woodbridge, Etobicoke, Ajax, Pickering, and Whitby.
The Professional Post Hole Guy provides Post hole drilling/digging and setting for Residential, Commercial and Industrial properties.
The Professional Post Hole Guy has expertise in drilling  various size holes for posts and deck footings; 8", 10",12'', 18''. The Professional Post Hole Guy provides the concrete for all post installation; for deck footings the sono tubes and saddles are provided as well. The holes are auger drilled with a tractor which gives you  perfectly round holes, this will prevent heaving, with the freeze and thaw. The tractor which is used to drilled the holes are equipped with turf tires which do not damage lawns. The Professional Post Hole Guy will also hand dig holes for areas which are not accessible by the tractor which requires a 34" clearance.

Our trained crew will ensure posts are installed straight and built to last, which will add value to your property.

The Professional Post Hole Guy employs only certified welders to complete all fabricating jobs, we are equipped to handle most welding & fabricating jobs,please call for a free estimate.

The Professional Post Hole Guy can also refer you to a reputable fence/deck contractor.   

At The Professional Post Hole Guy safety is a high priority, we are ISNETWORLD SAFETY COMPLIED.
services: fence post installation, fence post repair, deck-footing setup, deck footing repair,auger holes drilled.
specialities: fence post installation, fence post repair, deck-footing setup, deck footing repair,auger holes drilled
